articles.title: WHO: Omicron-fuelled COVID-19 surge flattening in Africa - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: After a six-week surge, Africa’s fourth pandemic wave driven primarily by the Omicron variant is flattening, marking the shortest-lived surge to date in the continent where cumulative cases have now exceeded 10 million, the World Health Organisation has said.
